member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.NodeInputs.InputProcedural.Refresh
member.summary: Causes the connected noodle to be re-rendered

member.name: P:Nodexr.Shared.NodeInputs.NodeInput.AffectsLayout
member.summary: Determines whether a change from this input should trigger a re-render of noodles connected to the parent node.

member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.Nodes.Node.CalculateInputsPos
member.summary: Set the position of each input based on the position of the node

member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.Nodes.Node.GetInputsRecursive
member.summary: Get all of the inputs to the node, including the 'previous' input and the sub-inputs of any InputCollections. InputCollections themselves are not returned.

member.name: P:Nodexr.Shared.RegexParsers.GroupParser.ParseGroup
member.summary: Parse any type of group. This includes anything in (non-escaped) parentheses.
